page.title: 08THE YOUTH CLUB...
page.content: The youth club in Methwold is called the "Pirates".It meets every Wednesday.The older group and younger group meet alternate weeks.The younger group are from 8 to 12 years and meet for one hour,from 7 to 8 o'clock.The older group are from 12 to 16 years and they meet for two hours,from 7 to 9 o'clock. "Pirates" is held in the village hall and the games that are played are pool,snooker and table-tennis.Each year there is an outing to Wickstead Park and frequent visits to the Roller Skating rink at Walpole Highway.Sometimes discos are held to raise money for club funds. You can buy sweets,crisps and cans of drink at"Pirates",and it is 20p subscription each week.Two adults help to run the club each week.
